attributes.title: Tar Sands Extraction
attributes.description:
Created on February 13, 2011 by bf701 on Sourcemap.org:

Crude bitumen contained in the Canadian oil sands is dug up here and transported to a processing facility, where it will be made into petroleum. (J Henry Fair and Wikipedia)
